page.title: 08FARMING - HISTORICAL LINKS
page.content: Our block is mainly farmland and many areas that are now residential areas used to be farmland. Places and road names show this connection with farming. e.g., The{Wheatsheaf}Hotel, Red{Acre, {Wheatacre}Cottage, White{Acre, Old{Mill}Avenue, Green{Acre, The{Mill}House Hotel,{Farm}Road, {Willow Tree}Avenue,{ Field}Road, {Meadow}Avenue,{ Paddock}Grove, Sutton{Mill}Dam, {Hawthorn}Road, {Frenchfield}Street,{Gorsey}Lane, {Yew Tree}Avenue, {Gorse}Lodge, {Northfield}Close,{Mill}Brow, {Meadowcroft, Oaks}Close, Four{Acre}Lane,{ Mill}Lane, {Rosehill}Avenue, {Abbotsfield}Road,
